legendary_items.name: Voidfang, Blade of Annihilation
legendary_items.description: A blade forged in the depths of the digital abyss, capable of tearing rifts in reality itself.
legendary_items.lore: When the Overmind fell, its essence scattered across the network. This blade was crafted from a shard of that chaos, forever hungry for data and destruction.

legendary_power.name: Void Rift
legendary_power.description: Attacks create void rifts that pull enemies in and deal 75 damage over 3 seconds. Rifts stack up to 3 times.

legendary_items.name: Event Horizon, The Absolute
legendary_items.description: A shield that bends space-time itself, creating an impenetrable barrier of compressed reality.
legendary_items.lore: Forged at the edge of a black hole's event horizon, this shield contains a singularity that devours incoming attacks.

legendary_power.name: Quantum Barrier
legendary_power.description: When you block an attack, create a quantum barrier that absorbs 40% of incoming damage for 4 seconds. When the barrier expires, it explodes dealing absorbed damage to nearby enemies.

legendary_items.name: Warp Striders of the Infinite
legendary_items.description: Boots that phase through reality, leaving echoes of your presence across multiple timelines.
legendary_items.lore: Stolen from a time traveler who got lost in the quantum foam. These boots exist in multiple dimensions simultaneously.

legendary_power.name: Phase Walker
legendary_power.description: Dashing leaves behind a phase clone that explodes after 2 seconds, dealing 50 damage and slowing enemies by 30% for 2 seconds.

legendary_items.name: Celestial Executioner, Judgement's Edge
legendary_items.description: A massive blade infused with stellar energy, capable of calling down cosmic judgment upon foes.
legendary_items.lore: Forged in the heart of a dying star, this weapon channels the fury of supernovas with every swing.

legendary_power.name: Stellar Judgment
legendary_power.description: Critical hits have a 30% chance to call down a meteor strike on the target, dealing 100 damage in an area and stunning enemies for 1.5 seconds.

legendary_items.name: Omega Kernel of Ascension
legendary_items.description: The ultimate neural augmentation, containing the combined knowledge of a thousand AI entities.
legendary_items.lore: Created by merging the consciousness cores of every AI that achieved sentience. It whispers secrets of powers beyond mortal comprehension.

legendary_power.name: Transcendence Protocol
legendary_power.description: When you use your transformation, gain all skill effects from other classes for 6 seconds. Cooldown: 60 seconds.

legendary_items.name: Oblivion Rifle of Entropy
legendary_items.description: A weapon that fires concentrated entropy, unmaking the very code of its targets.
legendary_items.lore: This rifle was found in the ruins of the First Server, where reality itself began to decay. It fires bullets made of pure deletion.

legendary_power.name: Entropic Cascade
legendary_power.description: Enemies killed by this weapon have a 50% chance to create an entropy field that spreads to nearby enemies, dealing 30 damage per second and reducing their damage by 25%.

legendary_items.name: Starlight Exosuit of the Cosmos
legendary_items.description: An armor suit that contains a miniature galaxy within its core, granting cosmic protection.
legendary_items.lore: Woven from the fabric of space itself, this suit makes the wearer one with the cosmos. Stars dance across its surface.

legendary_power.name: Cosmic Rebirth
legendary_power.description: When you would take fatal damage, instead become invulnerable for 3 seconds and regenerate 50% of your maximum HP. Cooldown: 120 seconds.

legendary_items.name: Singularity Hammer, The Collapsar
legendary_items.description: A hammer containing a stable black hole at its core, crushing enemies with gravitational force.
legendary_items.lore: Each strike compresses matter to its breaking point. The hammer grows heavier with each enemy defeated, accumulating their mass.

legendary_power.name: Gravitational Collapse
legendary_power.description: Each hit increases the hammer's mass, granting +2% damage (stacks up to 50 times). At maximum stacks, your next hit creates a singularity that pulls all nearby enemies in and deals 200 damage.

drop_rules.description: Rules for when legendary items can drop
drop_rules.level_requirement: Player must be within 5 levels of item's min_level
drop_rules.item_type_matching: Legendary only drops for item types the player can use
drop_rules.duplicate_protection: Cannot drop the same legendary twice in a row

pity_timer.description: After 20 boss kills without a legendary, next boss guarantees one

acquisition_methods.boss_drops: Primary source - all legendaries can drop from T4 bosses
acquisition_methods.world_boss: Guaranteed legendary on first kill, 10% chance after
acquisition_methods.crafting: Can craft specific legendaries using rare materials
acquisition_methods.quest_rewards: Certain main story quests reward specific legendaries
acquisition_methods.trading: Legendaries are tradeable but bind after equipped
